docs.title: 🚀 Project Overview
docs.text:
We're launching an online store selling magnetic nasal strips and mouth tape.

Core Business Model: - Main Product: Reusable magnetic nasal strips - Revenue Stream: Monthly subscription for magnetic sticker refills - Additional Product: Mouth tape

Current Phase: Website launch and market testing to validate product demand.

docs.title: 👥 Team
docs.text: Role Name Business Executive Lead Lucas Sales Lead Moses Project Manager Tinius Operations Associate Nathaniel Technical Consultant Vaibhav

docs.title: 🎯 Key Goals
docs.text:
1. Website Development & Launch
  2. Marketing & Advertising Setup
  3. Inventory Management

docs.title: Health Products Business Plan - Norway Market
Executive Summary
docs.text: We are developing a health products business focusing on sleep and restoration solutions for the Norwegian market, targeting both B2B and B2C channels. Our initial product line includes nasal strips and mouth tapes, with a planned TENS machine launch.

docs.title: Market Opportunity
docs.text:
pie title Target Market Segments
    "Severe Cases" : 216000
    "Chronic Rhinitis" : 2160000
    "Sleep Apnea & Snoring" : 864000

docs.title: Total Addressable Market (TAM)
docs.text:
• Primary Market (Severe Cases): 354-1,102M NOK/year
  • Secondary Market (Chronic Rhinitis): 583-2,074M NOK/year
  • Sleep Apnea Market: 622-2,074M NOK/year
  • Total Combined TAM: 1.56-5.25B NOK/year
graph TD
    A[Total Market: 1.56-5.25B NOK] --> B[Primary Market]
    A --> C[Secondary Market]
    A --> D[Sleep Apnea]
    B --> E[216K Users]
    C --> F[2.16M Users]
    D --> G[864K Users]

docs.title: Distribution Channels
docs.text:
1. B2B Partners:
  2. Healthcare Providers
    • Physical Therapists
    • Chiropractors
    • Dentists
    • Osteopaths
    • Orthodontic clinics
  3. Retail
    • Health food stores
    • Pharmacies
    • Gyms
  4. Sports Teams
    • Lillehammer hockey team partnership
  5. B2C Channel:
  6. Online subscription portal
  7. Target demographic: Ages 20-40
  8. Focus on sleep and restoration needs
flowchart LR
    A[Product Supply] --> B[B2B Partners]
    A --> C[B2C Channel]
    B --> D[Healthcare]
    B --> E[Retail]
    B --> F[Sports]
    C --> G[Online Portal]
    G --> H[Subscription Management]

docs.text: Product MOQ Price/Unit Total Cost Nasal Strip S1 100 $6.99 $699 Mouth Tape 500 $1.79 $895 Custom Packaging 500 $1.60 $800

docs.text:
• QR codes on packaging for easy refill orders
  • Display units for brand visibility
  • Digital portal for subscription management

docs.title: Cost Structure (NOK)
docs.text:
pie title Initial Investment Breakdown
    "Nasal Strips" : 7550
    "Mouth Tapes" : 9666
    "Bags" : 2160
    "Shipping" : 3000
    "Customs" : 969
    "Clearance" : 500
    "MVA" : 5961

docs.title: Detailed Costs
docs.text:
• Base Costs: 19,376kr
  • Nasal Strips (100): 7,550kr
  • Mouth Tapes (500): 9,666kr

  • Bags (100): 2,160kr

  • Additional Costs: 4,469kr

  • Shipping: 3,000kr
  • Customs (5%): 969kr
  • Clearance: 500kr
  • Final Total: 29,806kr (including 25% MVA)

docs.title: Implementation Timeline
docs.text:
gantt
    title Product Launch Timeline
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM
    section Phase 1
    TENS Machine Launch    :2024-01, 2m
    Brand Development     :2024-02, 2m
    section Phase 2
    B2B Partnership Development :2024-03, 3m
    Online Portal Launch  :2024-04, 2m
    section Phase 3
    Full Product Line Launch :2024-06, 3m

docs.title: Initial Investment Needs
docs.text:
• Product inventory: 29,806kr
  • TENS machine: $250
  • Marketing and display units
  • Digital platform development

docs.title: Strategic Partnership Opportunities
docs.text:
• Healthcare providers
  • Sports teams (Lillehammer hockey)
  • Retail chains

docs.title: Risk Mitigation
docs.text:
1. Starting with unbranded TENS machine to minimize inventory risk
  2. Phased product launch approach
  3. Multiple distribution channels
  4. Flexible pricing strategy

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
1. Secure initial funding
  2. Finalize supplier agreements
  3. Develop digital platform
  4. Establish key B2B partnerships
  5. Launch marketing campaign

docs.title: Product 1 - Nose Strip
docs.text: Product contents: - 1 Magnetic nasal strip - 30 Magnets (for 15 days of use) - Packaged as 1 strip + refill magnets

docs.title: Product 2 - Magnet Refill
docs.text: Product contents: - 3 Magnets per refill pack

docs.title: Product 3 - Mouth Tape
docs.text: Product contents: - 30 Mouth tapes per bag

docs.title: Packaging Requirements
docs.text:
• Custom packaging
  • Heat sealed mylar bags
  • Standard size: 10cm X 15cm

docs.title: Product & Supplier Specifications
docs.text: Last Updated: Nov 12, 2024

docs.title: 1. Product Overview
docs.text: Product Contents MOQ Price/Unit Total Nasal Strip (S1) 1 strip + 30 magnets 100 $6.99 $699 Nasal Strip (S2) 1 strip + 30 magnets 500 $9.17 ($2.18 EXW + $6.99) $4,585 Magnet Refill 3 magnets 500 TBD TBD Mouth Tape 30 tapes/bag 500 $1.79 $895 NORGESPAKKEN 120 magnets + 2 strips + 60 tapes TBD TBD TBD

docs.title: 2. Packaging Options
docs.text: Type MOQ Price/Bag Total Small Custom 100 $2.00 $200 Bulk Custom 500 $1.60 $800 Custom Logo 500 $1.79 $895

docs.title: 3. Supplier Comparison Matrix
docs.text:
Criteria Supplier 1 Supplier 2 MOQ 100 sets 500 sets Unit Cost $6.99 $9.17 Base Price (EXW) Not specified $2.18 Total MOQ Investment $699 $4,585 Lead Time TBD TBD

Printing Methods

  • Gravure Printing:
  • Best For: Large orders (20,000+ pieces)
  • Lead Time: 14 working days
  • Special Costs: Requires cylinder fee

  • Advantages: Lower unit price for large volumes

  • Digital Printing:

  • Best For: Smaller orders, multiple designs
  • Lead Time: 7 working days
  • Special Costs: No cylinder fee
  • Advantages: Multiple designs of same size possible, accurate color matching

docs.title: Initial Stock Cost Estimation (NOK)
docs.text: Base Product Costs (USD to NOK @ 10.8kr) NOK 100 Nasal Strips ($699) 7,550kr 500 Mouth Tapes ($895) 9,666kr 100 Bags ($200) 2,160kr Base Subtotal 19,376kr Additional Costs NOK Shipping (China) 3,000kr Customs Duty (5%) 969kr Customs Clearance 500kr Additional Subtotal 4,469kr Final Calculation NOK Total Before MVA 23,845kr MVA (25%) 5,961kr Total After MVA 29,806kr

docs.title: Immediate Decisions Required
docs.text:
1. Select nasal strip supplier based on MOQ and investment capacity
  2. Confirm logo placement on mouth tapes
  3. Choose packaging type based on order volume
  4. Determine initial order quantities for each product
  5. Select printing method based on order volume
